  • type Signature alg :: Type

  • derivePubKey :: Proxy alg -> PrivateKey alg -> PubKey alg
  • addressFromPubKey :: Proxy alg -> PubKey alg -> Address

data HandlersContext alg ms core = HandlersContext {
  • signatureAlgP :: Proxy alg
  • modules :: ModuleList ms (Effs ms core)
  • beginBlocker :: BeginBlock -> Sem (Effs ms core) ()
  • endBlocker :: EndBlock -> Sem (Effs ms core) EndBlockResult
  • anteHandler :: AnteHandler (Effs ms core)
  • compileToCore :: forall a. Sem (BaseAppEffs core) a -> Sem core a
}
name: HandlersContext HandlersContext beginBlocker endBlocker signatureAlgP modules anteHandler compileToCore

display_html: makeApp :: forall alg ms core. RecoverableSignatureSchema alg => Message alg ~ Digest SHA256 => Member (Embed IO) core => ToApplication ms (Effs ms core) => HasTxRouter (ApplicationC ms) (Effs ms core) 'QueryAndMempool => HasTxRouter (ApplicationC ms) (BaseAppEffs core) 'QueryAndMempool => HasTxRouter (ApplicationD ms) (Effs ms core) 'Consensus => HasTxRouter (ApplicationD ms) (BaseAppEffs core) 'Consensus => HasQueryRouter (ApplicationQ ms) (Effs ms core) => HasQueryRouter (ApplicationQ ms) (BaseAppEffs core) => Eval ms core => HandlersContext alg ms core -> App (Sem core)
name: makeApp

data ModuleList (ms :: [Component]) r where
  • NilModules :: ModuleList '[] r
  • (:+) :: Module name check deliver query es deps r -> ModuleList ms r -> ModuleList (Module name check deliver query es deps ': ms) r
name: ModuleList :+ NilModules

display_html:
data Module (name :: Symbol) (check :: Type) (deliver :: Type) (query :: Type) (es :: EffectRow) (deps :: [Component]) (r :: EffectRow) = Module {
  • moduleTxChecker :: RouteTx check r
  • moduleTxDeliverer :: RouteTx deliver r
  • moduleQuerier :: RouteQ query r
  • moduleEval :: forall s. (Members TxEffs s, Members BaseEffs s, Members (DependencyEffs deps) s) => forall a. Sem (es :& s) a -> Sem s a
}
name: Module Module moduleTxChecker moduleTxDeliverer moduleQuerier moduleEval

class Eval ms (core :: EffectRow) where

name: Eval Effs eval

  • anteHandler :: AnteHandler (Effs ms core)

}
